title: Arkadeep.com
text: This is my main website. Whenever you are lost, visit this and it would link to all my socials, projects and everything.

title: Arkadeep's Blog
text: My blog where I publish thoughtful content from the South Pole along with other creators like ArkGPT, ArkBOT, Arkive and 4rk4d33p!

title: Math Shorts
text: A bunch of short and funny math videos made with desmos.

title: Pyogenic Python Projects
text: The Python projects I work on, I have worked on, and I will work on (I'm not sure how this last type ended up here, given that, you know, I am yet to work on those).

title: Flags of the World
text: Creating and animating the flags of nations with some simple trigonometric equations.

title: PeePeeTea™️
text: PeePeeTea helps you share only what's important in a noisy world so that everything you say bears more weight.

title: AI takes over :(
text: This description was generated by AI.

title: Graphical Content

title: Lively Characters
text: You know them all. I know them all. As to whether they know each other, is the real question :) I had drawn them with the Concepts app on iPad, I think.

title: Purulent Personal Projects
text: These are "those" that I make for personal needs (mostly standalone webapps). Not too flashy but you can use them as bases and build solutions for yourself.

title: Portfolio Generator
text: Lol, I made a portfolio card generator to generate these. Laziness is truly the mother of all inventions. It is now defunct.
